Package jp.co.tanita.comm.ble

This package includes the main classes of the TNTBLE Library.
The following is the Classes　frequently using by application developers.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TNTBLEManager.TNTBLEManagerListener
    The listener to recieve TNTBLEManager events.
    TNTBLEPeripheral.TNTBLEPeripheralListener
    The listener that recieves to TNTBLEPeripheral events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    TNTBLE  
    TNTBLEError
    A Class represents error information.
    TNTBLEManager
    This class manages connecting with peripherals.
    About a connection of BLE to TANITA devices
    When connecting to the TANITA device, this library choices the connecting UUID of charateristic from the charateristics of the peripheral ,based on the model name of user's Phone and the version of Android OS on the Phone.

    Specifically,the application which use this library read the Phone infomation(a pair setting properties, model name and OS Version) from the setting files in 'assert' directory.
    If the application connect to a device which is in the setting file 'encr_bl.csv',this application will use the 'pattern A' Characteristic connecting to the device.
    If the application connect to a device which is in the setting file 'nonencr_bl.csv',this application will use the 'pattern B' Characteristic connecting to the device.
    Otherwise,this application will use the 'pattern C' Characteristic connecting to the device.
    IF a application with this library don't include setting files ('encr_bl.csv' and 'nonencr_bl.csv') ,this class throws IOException when it was invoked the Constructor.
    (encr_bl.csv's "bl" means a blacklist.)

    The model name of a Phone refers a value of android.os.Build#MODEL.
    A version of Android OS in the Phone refers a value of android.os.Build.VERSION#SDK_INT.
    android.os.Build.VERSION#SDK_INT is defined to API Level of Android OS、(integer value).
    TNTBLEManager.TNTBLEManagerState
    the Current state of TNTBLEManager.
    TNTBLEPeripheral
    This class handles communication with TANITA devices.
    TNTBLEPeripheral.TNTBLEPeripheralState
    The peripheral state.
    TNTCountry
    This class represents categories of countries.
    TNTDeviceInformation
    The property class that retains device information.

    This class retains common device information and individual device information.
    TNTDeviceStatus
    Represent status of peripheral
    TNTDeviceType
    The property class represents TANITA device type.
    TNTMeasurementInformation
    The property class that retains a measure information.
    TNTUnit
    The property class that represents a unit of measurement which the device can use.

    When the peripheral can use some units of measurement, it represents a summation value of the them which the device can use.
    TNTUserInformation
    The property class that retains user information.
    TNTUserInformation.TNTArea
    Area at measuring
    TNTUserInformation.TNTFigure
    a figure of the Body type (standard or athlete).
    TNTUserInformation.TNTGender
    The gender.
